page.title: 02Whelphill Farm.
page.content: Mr Coubrough owns 3 and a half thousand acres,which is all hill ground.Mr Coubrough only grows one crop which is called oil-seed rape.It is produced to feed lambs.He has 1400 ewes,300 ewe hogs and 50 tups.They are all of the blackface breed.Mr Coubrough goes mainly to Lanark Market but also goes to Peebles and Biggar.Mr Coubrough gets up between 6am and 7am.He would then go round his sheep to feed them and to make sure they are not ill.He will then do any trator work.At night he might go back round the sheep.In winter he is not so busy and he then does all the tractor work.
